mapper.select: SELECT board_id, title, writer, read_cnt, reg_date FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY reg_date DESC) AS SEQ, board_id, title, writer, read_cnt, reg_date FROM board ) WHERE SEQ BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY board_id DESC
mapper.insert: insert into board (board_id, title, writer, password, read_cnt, content, reg_date, update_date) values(board_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{password}, 0, #{content}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET read_cnt = read_cnt + 1 WHERE board_id=#{boardId}
